Articles.Content:
You know, battlecruisers, carriers, corvettes, basically anything big, space-faring and sci-fi.

Heck, feed me your fighers too! And your SSTOs! And your tanks!

I may download them and face them against my own ships.

I will also give you rep, if your ship is extra tasty.

PLEEASE FEED MEE!

I have created a Mun/Minimus SSTO that preforms like my replicas, but is a also an SSTO

Its fast, reliable, and maneuverable. It is easily flown. 

**SSTO Xephos**

![B5fz78x.png](http://i.imgur.com/B5fz78x.png)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111395-SSTO-Xephos-the-Lamborghini-of-mun-SSTOs?p=1751389#post1751389](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111395-SSTO-Xephos-the-Lamborghini-of-mun-SSTOs?p=1751389#post1751389)

Very tasty! thanks!

do you have anything with missiles? Missiles are EXTRA tasty!

How about this?

![IlM1URI.gif](http://i.imgur.com/IlM1URI.gif)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110148-77-Industries-Weapons-Division-Missile-cruiser-with-automatic-reloading](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110148-77-Industries-Weapons-Division-Missile-cruiser-with-automatic-reloading)
Holy wow! Is that a space revolver? Very cool! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I call it a missile cruiser ... yeah something like that :-) Space revolver sounds nice too ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Remember you asked for it.

SR71 white bird

Capable of over 1500m/s at around 25km. 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CyVGNyeXIgw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[http://www./download/kzxsdkb3tkasa16/Sr-71+white+bird.craft](http://www./download/kzxsdkb3tkasa16/Sr-71+white+bird.craft)

SR72 white bird

Capable of over 2200m/s at 30-40km. 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eLwf0e7ZQ-0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[http://www./download/krai8x2hcbmfwbr/SR-72+White+bird.craft](http://www./download/krai8x2hcbmfwbr/SR-72+White+bird.craft)

B2 Spirit bomber 

Carries 26 sets of decoupler bombs 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LArA8H-2uz4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[http://www./download/50eg7zxadhp7xxj/B-2+Spirit+bomber+mk2.craft](http://www./download/50eg7zxadhp7xxj/B-2+Spirit+bomber+mk2.craft)

Titan hunter mk3

A jet of my own design, very maneuverable and capable of over 2000m/s in the upper atmosphere. 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/r88LM-7e7bI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[http://www./download/w3aad65c1qd17kf/Titan+Hunter+mk3.craft](http://www./download/w3aad65c1qd17kf/Titan+Hunter+mk3.craft)

Its not an SSTO, not a jet, and its not a tank, but its something.

I made a Kushan Interceptor, inspired by reinstalling Homeworld. It think it looks raterh fine.. but actually flying it is a nightmare. At least in atmosphere. Those wings I had to use for the looks are way to far forward of the center of mass.
